duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and direct accounting and financial activities of multiple locations
Oversee the preparation of financial reports and assessments
Ensure accuracy of financial reporting and compliance with laws
Prepare annual budgets and monthly forecasts
Manage tax exempt status and prepare tax form filings
Implement, manage, and automate accounting and business processes
Coordinate responses to inquiries from tax authorities
Manage collection process and daily cash receipts

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Finance/Accounting or equivalent
